name: Company of Heroes 2: Master Collection
summary:
The sequel to one of the highest rated Strategy games of all time returns with an innovative warfare experience that redefines the Strategy genre once more. Boasting cutting-edge technology for increased graphical quality and accuracy of deadly combat, develop and utilize your new Commander Abilities and experience the up-close moment-to-moment brutality of frontline warfare in single-player or intense competitive and co-operative multi-player.

This unmissable package regroups the original Company of Heroes 2 and all its expansions (The Western Front Armies, Ardennes Assault and The British Forces) – as well as the Theater of War mission packs. Includes 2 single-player campaigns and 5 multiplayer armies.
